name: Payback Time 报仇时刻
description:
A power cut came, what illusions will I see? I have to wait in the darkness? Is it just my dream? (Wait in the room for a longer while, some boxes will appear anywhere, try to get near to it)

停电了，我会看到什么样的幻觉？在黑暗中我安全吗？或者这只是我的一个梦吗？

（等在房间里，触发事件，靠近随机出现的盒子触发剧情）

@Chong Guang Games 重光游戏工作室

Controls:

W/A/S/D For Basic Movement; 

Press F To Use The Elevator; 

Press E To Interect;

 Press Shift To Run
